page.title: 02Golspie Gala Week.
page.content: Golspie Gala Week is a concentrated week of many events,staged every year at the end of July and the beginning of August,organised by local volunteers,for local people and holiday visitors alike. The emphasis is placed on traditional music with pipe bands, ceilidhs,Highland Dancing and evenings of songs and stories but also includes exhibitions,sporting events and modern popular music. Children are well catered for with children's sports,pet shows,fancy dress parades,sandcastle competitions and evening discos. THere is a large choice of activities every day ,many of them free of charge and helps ensure strong local and holiday maker support,many of them returning year afer year.
